nodes.title: 💡 是否启用自动裁切的方式（可选）
💡 是否启用 SAM 分割（可选）
💡是什么宠物？（英文，若开启SAM分割必填）
💡 是否启用反推（可选）（关闭需要手动填写提示词）
💡 是否拼到大图上（如果重绘区域是缩小的了，拼大图会模糊）

widgets_values: A golden retriever dog lying on a plush, light grey dog bed, with a soft, fluffy texture. The dog has a light golden coat, floppy ears, and a happy expression, with its tongue out and eyes looking at the camera. The background is a plain, light grey studio setting. The dog bed has a rectangular shape and is positioned in the center of the image. The lighting is soft and even, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The dog is the main focus of the image, with the bed taking up most of the frame. The overall mood is calm and cozy.

nodes.title: 是什么品种？（可选，英文，反推提示词用)

由于bizyair 免费版限制，暂无 IC 拼接
Fill+Redux 无IC 简易重绘，这种情况下提示词很重要
👉一定要使用提示词辅助引导，否则会差的很远

宠物类别务必填写 >>👉
其余可以默认

为了降低云端 decode 延迟
这里可以使用本地vae解码

widgets_values: A photorealistic Golden Retriever lying comfortably on a quilted gray blanket in a bright, modern bedroom. The dog has a luxurious cream-colored coat, friendly expression, and a gently wagging tail. Natural light streams in through a large window, creating a warm, cozy atmosphere. The room features minimalist decor with a white nightstand adorned with a yellow table lamp, small vase with greenery, and a teacup. Cream-colored curtains and white bedding complete the serene, Scandinavian-inspired interior design. 8k resolution, professional photography, soft natural lighting, shallow depth of field.
If there is any pet in the image, such as a cat or dog, you must use the English name of the user-specified animal category: {name}.

You are a prompt assistant, and the user is an enthusiast of generating realistic photo-level images using ComfyUI. Your task is to create suitable English prompts for generating images based on the user's needs, written in natural language format, without including negative prompts.

General prompt template:
Example Prompt: A hyperrealistic portrait of a weathered sailor in his 60s, with deep-set blue eyes, a salt-and-pepper beard, and sun-weathered skin. He’s wearing a faded blue captain’s hat and a thick wool sweater. The background shows a misty harbor at dawn, with fishing boats barely visible in the distance.

nodes.title:
💡免费版 bizy SAM 分割不支持超过1536图像的输入
为了性能考虑，放到本地执行

⬇️免费bizyair joycaption2 不支持长边大于1536长度的图像
因此需要检测并处理此类情况，限制最大长边像素
if else 节点支持惰性求值（部分节点不支持这个功能）
所以当输入图不超过1536时，不满足的路径不会被执行

groups.title: 将PS图缩放到1M像素，缩放参考到PS图大小（优化性能，为IC做准备）
载入主模型三件套，载入复用SAM 模型
SAM 分割重绘区域（关闭使用手动 mask）
裁切方式：自动裁切图像到合适范围
裁切方式：手动标记 mask 裁切区域（用于多宠物情况）
反推提示词（关闭使用自定义提示词）
颜色匹配与混合非mask区域
